metadata.title: CVE-2024-53907 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Potential denial-of-service in django.utils.html.strip_tags()

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-53907` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-django - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.15+esm8
python-django-common - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.15+esm8
python3-django - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.15+esm8
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: python-django package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.7-1ubuntu5.15+esm8').
